event_summary: Gaming convention showcasing latest video games, esports tournaments, and virtual reality experiences from global developers.
commentary_summary: Gaming journalists highlighted the impressive esports competitions and innovative VR demonstrations that pushed industry boundaries.
next_event_plan: Add game development workshops and create indie game developer showcase area
event_highlight: World championship esports final with $5 million prize pool watched by 20 million online viewers
event_object: To celebrate gaming culture and provide platform for gamers, developers, and esports athletes
event_conclusion: Premiered 100 new games, hosted 15 esports tournaments, and generated $10 million in merchandise sales
event_conclusion_overall: Phenomenal event that reinforced South Korea's position as global gaming hub with record participation
next_event_suggestion: Expand retro gaming section and add game design education programs
